message: The case, charm and pop-socket came exactly as shown on the pics! The case is sturdy and feels very good quality wise :) I feel like the magnet could be a little bit stronger but that's probably just a personal preference. The delivery took some time but in the end it was still delivered two days before the actual announced date. It's absolutely adorable, I cant wait to use my new phone with it ! :)

I bought a Miffy phone case and it is SUPER CUTE! It arrived earlier than expected and the quality is amazing. The packaging was beautiful and came with some Miffy stickers. The seller is kind and I would highly recommend buying from this shop. I will definitely return!!

The phone case is fantastic, particularly the soft and cute charm. The attention to detail, like the heart-shaped bubble wrap, really impressed me. It fits my phone perfectly and looks great. Regarding the delivery, while I knew the estimate beforehand, waiting three weeks was a bit challenging as I'm used to faster international shipping. Other than the wait, everything was perfect!

This phone case is out of this world! 

The quality and design of this case is incredible. The case is sturdy, has a good lip for both the camera and the phone screen. The MagSafe cinnamoroll is extremely high quality, with clear design, and has a spinning feature (yellow bear) that was a pleasant surprise. I have genuinely never been more in love with a phone case and cannot recommend this product enough. 

More importantly, the customer service from Y2KASEstudio was phenomenal. There was a slight mishap with sizing and Sarah was willing to correct this immediately. I WILL be buying more from this store, trust.
Beautiful item. Arrived as expected and in great quality. Thank you :)

The case is high quality and durable and the Miffy grip even pops out, I highly recommend supporting them! They package it so nicely with a photo, stickers and personalised message, and delivery came way earlier than expected! TYSM for such a cute case!!
It came before its initial date between tomorrow and January 6! I also loved that they‚Äôve included a thank you note and a cute sticker/picture.

I got this case (with some silly second opinions from friends and siblings) to go with a phone upgrade I recently had. It was well worth the wait, and my package even arrived a tad before the eta. The case is ADORABLE, it slipped right in place, and it has a good grip compared to an $8 substitute I bought elsewhere. 

I also got the charm add-on! It took me a minute to figure out how to attach it to my phone, but I‚Äôm happy to have it on now! Overall well worth the purchase‚Äîespecially if there‚Äôs a sale on!
